OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD SOCIETY FOR THE ENCOURAGEMENT OF ART, THE (SSEA)

AltName.entry: SHEFFIELD ART COLLECTIONS FUND (SACF), SHEFFIELD SOCIETY OF ARTS (SSA)

Desc.entry: Arranges lectures (both public and private), exhibitions, visits and publications on fine and decorative arts and crafts. Organises soirees, lunches and dinners. Also holds discussion and opera groups.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Usually fortnightly, please contact for details
